lines: Ndili mubisyi wini Jesu wa ka ndi fwida
Kuti ndi kaye kwakwe kuti nditafwi limbi;
Ndili mbuli mutabi ndi wakwe u li wangu
Luyando lwakwe Jesu lu la inda ku julu,
Ndupati kwinda lwizi luyando lu ta mani,
Luyando lwa ndi jana nketana ku muyanda.
Ndili mubisyi wini waba konse kuliÕme,
U lizyi nce ndabula a ku pengesya kwangu,
